events.message: I recently received my order, but it was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions a desire for a refund; assigning this case to the Refund cluster.
Assigning this refund request case to the customer support agent Jane Smith for resolution.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I understand you would like a refund for your recent order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can check the details for you?
My order number is 987654321. I want a refund because the item arrived damaged and is not functioning properly.
Thank you for providing the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to ship the damaged item back.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the assistance and will send the item back right away.
Your refund request has been processed, and you will receive the amount back within 5 business days once the return is received.
Just checking in to confirm your refund was received and to see if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund process is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case.
